RPGXplorerObject.Name: Amulet of the Planes
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Allows its wearer to utilize plane shift. Must succeed on DC15 Int check or go to random location.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Amulet of Proof against Detection and Location.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Protects the wearer from scrying and magical location just as a nondetection spell does.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Apparatus of the Crab
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Barrel-shaped crawling vehicle.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Magical container that weighs the same regardless of the weight of its contents.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Contains ball that summons animal when thrown.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Contains ball that summons animal when thrown.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bag of Tricks, Tan
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Contains ball that summons animal when thrown.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bead of Force
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can be thrown to deal damage. Also functions as resilient sphere.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Belt, Monk's
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Confers monk-like unarmed combat abilities.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Non Dwarves gain darkvision 60', stonecunning, +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution, and +2 resistance bonus on saves against poison, spells, and spell-like effects.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Belt of Strength +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants enhancement bonus to strength.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Belt of Strength +6
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants enhancement bonus to strength.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Blessed Book
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 1000 page blank spellbook.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boat, Folding
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Magical boat that folds into a small box.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Elvenkind
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 competence bonus on Move Silently checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Levitation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Allows wearer to levitate.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Speed
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Act under effects of haste for ten rounds.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Striding and Springing
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Boots of Striding and Springing.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Increases base speed by 10ft and grants +5 competence bonus on Jump checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Teleportation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Teleport 3/day as per the spell.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of the Winterlands
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This footgear bestows many powers upon the wearer. First, he is able to travel across snow at his normal speed, leaving no tracks. The boots also enable him to travel at normal speed across the most s

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots, Winged
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Fly three times day for up to 5 minutes per flight.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bottle of Air
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A character can draw air out of the bottle to breathe. The bottle can even be shared by multiple characters who pass it around. Breathing out of the bottle is a standard action.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When the bowl is filled with fresh water, and certain words are spoken, a Large water elemental appears.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracelet of Friends
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When a charm is grasped and the name of the keyed individual is spoken, that person is called to the spot (a standard action) along with his or her gear, as long as the owner and the called person are

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Archery, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The bracers empower the wearer to use any bow (not including crossbows) as if she were proficient in its use. If she already has proficiency with any type of bow, she gains a +2 competence bonus on at

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Archery, Lesser
RPGXplorerObject.Description: These wristbands function as greater bracers of archery, except that they grant a +1 competence bonus on attack rolls and no bonus on damage rolls.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +1
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +8
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +7
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +6
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +5
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Bracers of Armor +3
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer a bonus to armor, as if wearing armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Brazier of Fire Elemental Commanding
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Brazier of Commanding Fire Elementals.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When a fire is lit in the brazier and the proper summoning words are spoken, a Large fire elemental appears.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Brooch of Shielding
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A brooch can absorb up to 101 points of damage from magic missiles before it melts and becomes useless.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Broom of Flying
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This broom is able to fly through the air as if affected by an overland flight spell (average maneuverability) for up to 9 hours per day (split up as its owner desires).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Candle of Invocation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Buring the candle grants +2 to attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks withing 30' of the candle as long as you have the same alignment.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Candle of Truth
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This white tallow candle, when burned, calls into place a zone of truth spell (Will DC 13 negates) in a 5-foot radius centered on the candle.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cape of the Mounteback
RPGXplorerObject.Description: On command, this bright red and gold cape allows the wearer to use the magic of the dimension door spell once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Carpet of Flying, Type I
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This rug is able to fly through the air as if affected by an overland flight spell of unlimited duration.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Carpet of Flying, Type II
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This rug is able to fly through the air as if affected by an overland flight spell of unlimited duration.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Carpet of Flying, Type III
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This rug is able to fly through the air as if affected by an overland flight spell of unlimited duration.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Censer of Controlling Air Elementals
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Censer of Controlling Air Elementals.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This 6-inch-wide, 1-inch-high perforated golden vessel resembles a thurible found in a place of worship. If it is filled with incense and lit, summoning words spoken over it summon forth a Large air e

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Chaos Diamond
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This lustrous gemstone is uncut and about the size of a human fist.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Chime of Interruption
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This instrument can be struck once every 10 minutes, and its resonant tone lasts for 3 full minutes.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Chime of Opening
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A chime of opening is a hollow mithral tube about 1 foot long. When struck, it sends forth magical vibrations that cause locks, lids, doors, valves, and portals to open.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Circlet of Blasting, Minor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: On command, this simple golden headband projects a blast of searing light (3d8 points of damage) once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ciclet of Blasting, Major
RPGXplorerObject.Description: On command, this elaborate golden headband projects a blast of searing light (5d8 maximized for 40 points of damage) once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Circlet of Persuasion
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This silver headband grants a +3 competence bonus on the wearer’s Charisma-based checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of the Arachnida
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Allows use of spider climb, immunity to webs, and +2 on Fortitude saves against poinson from spiders.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of the Bat
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer +5 competence bonus on Hide checks. Can also hang upside down or fly.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of Charisma +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer an enhancement bonus to Charisma.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of Charisma +6
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer an enhancement bonus to Charisma.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of Charisma +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants wearer an enhancement bonus to Charisma.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of Displacement, Minor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants 20% miss chance.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of Displacement, Major
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants 50% miss chance.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of Elvenkind
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 Competance bonus to hide checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of Etherealness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use the cloak to go ethereal for up to ten minutes a day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Cloak of the Manta Ray.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain natural armor, a swim speed and underwater breathing when in contact with salt water.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Harp of Charming
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Work a magic suggestion into your performance

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Hat of Disguise
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Hat that grants use of disguise self

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Headband of Intellect +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Headband of Intellect +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +4 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Headband of Intellect +6
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Helm of Brilliance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain fire resistance 30; use the helm's gmes to create spell-like powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Helm of Comprehend Languages and Read Magic
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Helm of Comprehend Languages and Read Magic.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Understand any spoke or written language; gain +5 bonus on Dechiper Script checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: +5 Skill (Decipher Script) [to understand messages written in incomplete, archaic, or exotic forms]
RPGXplorerObject.Limiter: to understand messages written in incomplete, archaic, or exotic forms

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Helm of Telepathy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Detect thoughts at will; send telepathic message to people; suggestion 1/day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Helm of Teleportation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Teleport 3/day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Helm of Underwater Action
RPGXplorerObject.Description: See underwater; create a breathable bubble of air underwater.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Blasting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Deal sonic damage and deafen opponents.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Blasting, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Deal sonic damage, stun, and deafen opponents.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Fog
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Create obscuring mist

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Goodness/Evil
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain magic circle against opposing alignment.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of the Tritons
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Calm rough water, attract sharks, or cause intelligent aquatic creatures to become panicked.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Valhalla, Silver
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Summon 2d4+2, 2nd-level barbarians

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Valhalla, Brass
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Summon 2d4+1, 3rd-level barbarians

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Valhalla, Bronze
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Summon 2d4, 4th-level barbarians

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horn of Valhalla, Iron
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Summon 1d4+1, 5th-level barbarians

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horseshoes of Speed
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Increase mount's speed by 30 ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Horseshoes of a Zephyr
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Mount levitages 4 inches from the ground, allowing it to pass over rough surfaces.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Incense of Meditation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Prepare spells as though they were Maximized without increasing their actual level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Instant Fortress
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Portable cube that instantly expands to a large fortress.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Clear
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Sustains creature without food or water.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Vibrant Purple
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Store three levels of spells.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Iridescent
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Sustains creature without air.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Pale Lavender
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Absorbs 20 levels of spells of 4th level or lower.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Pearly White
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Regenerate 1 HP/hour.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Pale Green
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Orange
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 caster level.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Lavender and Green
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Absorbs 50 levels of spells of 8th level or lower.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ioun Stone, Pink and Green
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 bonus to Cha.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Iron Bands of Binding
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Hold a creature immobile 1/day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Iron Flask
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Hold a creature captive in the flask and force it to serve for 1 hour upon release.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Lantern of Revealing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Reveal insible creature within 25 as with invisibility purge.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Lens of Detection
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 bonus on Search checks; +5 bonus on Survival checks to track.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Lyre of Building
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Construct locations at great speeds; make objects immune to damage for 30 minutes 1/day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mantle of Faith
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain DR 5/evil.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mantle of Spell Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain SR 21.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Con.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain a +1 inherent bonus to Dex.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Marvelous Pigments
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Create mundane inanimate objects.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mask of the Skull
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Mask that can attack oponents and strike them dead.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mattock of the Titans
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Loosen or tumble earth or earthen ramparts, smash rocks; Gargantuan +3 adamantine warhammer.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Medallion of Thoughts
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use detect thoughts at will.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mirror of Lifetrapping
RPGXplorerObject.Description: People seeing their reflection in the mirror become trapped within it.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mirror of Mental Prowess
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Read thoughts of relfected creature; view places with clairvoyance; portal to other locations; receive answer to a short question.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mirror of Opposition
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creates a duplicate of the reflected creature which immediately attacks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Necklace of Adaptation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain immunity to all harmful vapor and gases; able to breath underwater and in vacuums.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Orb of Storms
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use control weather 1/day and storm of vengeance 1/month; gain effects of endure elements.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Necklace of Fireballs, Type I
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Throw a bead from the necklace to create a fireball.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Throw a bead from the necklace to create a fireball.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Ball
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use device to see over any distance or into other plances, as with the spell scrying.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Ball with detect thoughts
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use device to see over any distance or into other plances, as with the spell scrying. Will DC 13 negates.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use device to see over any distance or into other plances, as with the spell scrying.

RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use device to see over any distance or into other plances, as with the spell scrying.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Ball with true seeing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Use device to see over any distance or into other plances, as with the spell scrying.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cube of Force
RPGXplorerObject.Description: put up a special wall of force 10' around your person

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cube of Frost Resistance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: creates a cube-shaped area 10 feet on a side centered on the possessor with a temperate climate.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Cubic Gate
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gate to 6 outer planes

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Darkskull
RPGXplorerObject.Description: unhallow area of effect

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Decanter of Endless Water
RPGXplorerObject.Description: an amount of fresh or salt water pours out of this vessel.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Deck of Illusions
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When a card is drawn at random and thrown to the ground, a major image of a creature is formed.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dimensional Shackles
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Any creature bound within them is affected as if a dimensional anchor spell

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Drums of Panic
RPGXplorerObject.Description: all creatures within 120 feet are affected as by a fear spell.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dust of Appearance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: coats invisible, blurred, or displaced creatures to negate effects.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dust of Dryness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: transforms up to 100 gallons of water to nothingness

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dust of Illusion
RPGXplorerObject.Description: affects target creature as Disguise Self

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dust of Tracelessness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Hides the passage of its possessor and companions

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Efficient Quiver
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Extradimensional space holds arrows, javelins, spears, staffs, etc.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Efreeti Bottle
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Bottle contains a trapped efreeti.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elemental Gem
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Summons an elemental of a specific type.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elixir of Fire Breath
RPGXplorerObject.Description: bestows the ability to spit gouts of flame dealing 4d6 points fire damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elixir of Hiding
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 competence bonus on hide checks for 1 hour

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elixir of Love
RPGXplorerObject.Description: creature becomes charmed with the first creature seen.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elixir of Sneaking
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 bonus to move silenty checks

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elixir of Swimming
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 competence bonus on swim checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elixir of Truth
RPGXplorerObject.Description: forces individual to say nothing but the truth for 10 minutes

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Elixir of Vision
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 competence bonus on search checks for 1 hour

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eversmoking Bottle
RPGXplorerObject.Description: obscures vision for up to 100-foot radius

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eyes of Charming
RPGXplorerObject.Description: crystal lenses allow user to use charm person

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eyes of Doom
RPGXplorerObject.Description: user can cast doom as a gaze attack.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eyes of Petrification
RPGXplorerObject.Description: allows petrification gaze attack for 10 rounds per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eyes of the Eagle
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 competence bonus on Spot checks

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Feather Token - Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: moor a craft in water so as to render it immobile for up to one day

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Feather Token - Bird
RPGXplorerObject.Description: can be used to deliver a small written message unerringly to a designated target as would a carrier pigeon

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Feather Token - Fan
RPGXplorerObject.Description: forms a huge flapping fan, causing a breeze of sufficient strength to propel one ship.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Feather Token - Swan Boat
RPGXplorerObject.Description: forms a swanlike boat capable of moving on water at a speed of 60 feet.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Feather Token - Tree
RPGXplorerObject.Description: causes a great oak to spring into being.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Feather Token - Whip
RPGXplorerObject.Description: forms into a huge leather whip and wields itself against any opponent desired just like a dancing weapon.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Bronze Griffon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a bronze griffon under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Ebony Fly
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a large fly under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Goldon Lions
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a pair of lions under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Ivory Goats
RPGXplorerObject.Description: a trio of goat statuettes that animate under command of their possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Marble Elephant
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a full-size elephant under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Obsidian Steed
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a heavy warhorse with planar travel abilities under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Onyx Dog
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a dog under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Serpentine Owl
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a horned owl or giant owl under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Figurine of Wondrous Power - Silver Raven
RPGXplorerObject.Description: animates to a raven under command of its possessor

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gauntlets of Ogre Power
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 enhancement to Strength

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gauntlets of Rust
RPGXplorerObject.Description: affect object as with rusting grasp spell.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gem of Brightness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: crystal emits a bright light for an effect

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gem of Seeing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: enables user to see as though affected by the true seeing spell.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Glove of Storing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: stores one item under 20 lbs, retrievable as free action.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gloves of Arrow Snaring
RPGXplorerObject.Description: wearer can use the Snatch Arrows feat twice per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gloves of Dexterity +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 dexterity enhancement bonus

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gloves of Dexterity +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +4 dexterity enhancement bonus

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gloves of Dexterity +6
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +6 dexterity enhancement bonus

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gloves of Swimming and Climbing
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Gloves of Swimming and Climbing.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 competence bonus on Swim and Climb checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Goggles of Minute Seeing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 competence bonus on search checks

RPGXplorerObject.Name: +5 Skill (Search) [Competence] [to find secret doors or hidden compartments]
RPGXplorerObject.Limiter: to find secret doors or hidden compartments

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Goggles of Night
RPGXplorerObject.Description: grants 60' darkvision

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Golem Manual - Clay
RPGXplorerObject.Description: contains information, incantations and magical power that help a character to craft a golem

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Golem Manual - Flesh
RPGXplorerObject.Description: contains information, incantations and magical power that help a character to craft a golem

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Golem Manual - Iron
RPGXplorerObject.Description: contains information, incantations and magical power that help a character to craft a golem

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Golem Manual - Stone
RPGXplorerObject.Description: contains information, incantations and magical power that help a character to craft a golem

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Golem Manual - Stone (Greater)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: contains information, incantations and magical power that help a character to craft a golem

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Hand of Glory
RPGXplorerObject.Description: allows user to wear an extra magical ring

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Hand of the Mage
RPGXplorerObject.Description: wearer can utlize mage hand at will

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Handy Haversack
RPGXplorerObject.Description: acts as a bag of holding with three pockets, and the item the user is looking for is always on top.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 1st Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 1st-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 2nd Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 2nd-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 3rd Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 3rd-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 4th Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 4tht-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 5th Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 5th-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 6th Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 6th-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 7th Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 7th-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 8th Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 8th-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of Power, 9th Level Spell
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, recall any 9th-level spell you had prepared and then cast.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl of the Sirines
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Breathe in water, 60 ft. swim speed, cast spells and act underwater without hindrance.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Periapt of Health
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Immune to diseases (including supernatural diseases).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Periapt of Proof against Poison
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Periapt of Proof against Poison.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Immune to poison.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Periapt of Wisdom +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Periapt of Wisdom +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Periapt of Wisdom +6
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +6 enhancement bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Periapt of Wound Closure
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Automatically stablalize, double normal rate of healing.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Phylactery of Faithfulness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants awareness of actions or items that could adversely affect your alignment and standing with deity.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Phylactery of Undead Turning
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Turn undead as if 4 levels higher.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pipes of Haunting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Those within 30 ft. may become fatigued.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pipes of Pain
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Those within 30 ft. may be fascinated and, when piping stops, take damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pipes of the Sewers
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Attract 1d3 rat swarms.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pipes of Sounding
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Mimic the ghost sound spell

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Portable Hole
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Bring an extradimensional space into being.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Restorative Ointment
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Neutralizes poison, removes disease, or cures wounds.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ring Gates
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Transport up to 100 lbs of material up to 100 miles between rings. Can attack or cast spells through the rings.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Robe of the Archmagi
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +5 armor bonus to AC, SR 18, +4 resistance bonus on all saves, +2 enhancement bonus on CL checks to overcome SR.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: +2 Caster Level Check [Enhancement] [to overcome a creature's spell resistance]
RPGXplorerObject.Limiter: to overcome a creature's spell resistance

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Robe of Blending
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +10 competence bonus to Hide checks and adopt the appearance of another creature at will.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Robe of Bones
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Create minor undead.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Robe of Eyes
RPGXplorerObject.Description: 120-ft. darkvision, see invisible and ethereal, +10 to Search and Spot checks, always retain Dex bonus to AC, can't be flanked.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Robe of Scintillating Colors
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Up to 10 rounds/day, may daze those nearby, confers concealment, illuminates your surroundings

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Robe of Stars
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Allows travel physically to Astral Plane, +1 bonus on all saving throws, create up to 6 +5 shuriken.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Robe of Useful Items
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Detachable patches become useful mundane equipment, money, animal, and the like.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Rope of Climbing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Rope responds to your commands.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Rope of Entanglement
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Can command rope to entangle a victim.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Salve of Slipperiness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +20 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks, not impeded by obstructions such as webs.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Scabbard of Keen Edges
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Casts keen edge up to 3 times/day on any knife, dagger, sword, or similar weapon up to greatsword size.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Scarab of Protection
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain SR 20, protects against energy draining attacks, death effects, and negative energy effects.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Scarab, Golembane
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Detect any golem within 60 ft., golem opponents lose damage reduction.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shrouds of Disintegration
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Turn a body wrapped in the shrouds to dust.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Silversheen
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Give a weapon the properties of alchemical silver for 1 hour.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Slippers of Spider Climbing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Move on vertical surfaces, even upside down, with hands free and a speed of 20 feet.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sovereign Glue
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Bonds any two substances together in a permanent union.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Stone of Alarm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: When activated and subsequently touched, emits a piercing screech heard up to a quarter mile away.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Stone of Controlling Earth Elementals.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Summon a Huge earth elemental.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 luck bonus on saving throws, ability checks, and skill checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Stone Horse - Courser
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Full-size statue turns into a heavy horse.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Stone Horse - Destrier
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Full-size statue turns into a heavy warhorse.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Stone Salve
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Either returns a petrified creature to flesh, or protects a nonpetrified creature as stoneskin spell.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Strand of Prayer Beads, Lesser
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wearer can cast certain divine spells.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Strand of Prayer Beads, Standard
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wearer can cast certain divine spells.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Strand of Prayer Beads, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Wearer can cast certain divine spells.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Clear Thought +1
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +1 inherent bonus to Intelligence score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Clear Thought +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +2 inherent bonus to Intelligence score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Clear Thought +3
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +3 inherent bonus to Intelligence score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Clear Thought +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +4 inherent bonus to Intelligence score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Clear Thought +5
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +5 inherent bonus to Intelligence score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sustaining Spoon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Produces sufficient gruel each day to feed up to four humans.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +1
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Tome of Leadership and Influence.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +1 inherent bonus to Charisma score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +2
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Tome of Leadership and Influence.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +2 inherent bonus to Charisma score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +3
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Tome of Leadership and Influence.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +3 inherent bonus to Charisma score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +4
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Tome of Leadership and Influence.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +4 inherent bonus to Charisma score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Leadership and Influence +5
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Wondrous Items\Tome of Leadership and Influence.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +5 inherent bonus to Charisma score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Understanding +1
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +1 inherent bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Understanding +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +2 inherent bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Understanding +3
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +3 inherent bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Understanding +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +4 inherent bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Tome of Understanding +5
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Gain +5 inherent bonus to Wisdom score.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Unguent of Timelessness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Preserves matter that was once alive from aging and object gains +1 resistance bonus on all saving throws.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Universal Solvent
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Dissolves sovereign glue and tanglefoot bags.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Vest of Escape
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +4 competence bonus on Open Lock checks, and +6 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Vestment, Druid's
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A wearer with the wild shape ability can use that ability one additional time each day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Well of Many Worlds
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Creates a two-way portal; anything placed inside is cast to another world.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Wind Fan
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Duplicates the gust of wind spell.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Wings of Flying
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants a fly speed of 60 ft. with good maneuverability.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Amulet of Catapsi
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, the wearer can mentally command the catapsi power, which blankets a 30- foot-radius area surrounding the wearer in telepathic noise for 9 rounds.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Landing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer lands on her feet no matter how far she falls, and takes 2 fewer dice of damage from the fall than normal.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Skating
RPGXplorerObject.Description: These boots allow the wearer to slide along the ground at will as if using the skate power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Stomping
RPGXplorerObject.Description: These boots allow the wearer to use stomp as the power three times per day (Reflex save DC 13) when the wearer stomps her feet.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Boots of Temporal Acceleration
RPGXplorerObject.Description: These boots allow the wearer to speed up his own time frame for 2 rounds as if using the power temporal acceleration. The wearer can use this power once per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Body Crystal Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Crystal Anchor which targets those using psychometabolism powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Comprehension Crystal Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Crystal Anchor which targets those using clairsentience powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Creation Crystal Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Crystal Anchor which targets those using metacreativity powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Energy Crystal Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Crystal Anchor which targets those using psychokinesis powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ghost Crystal Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Crystal Anchor which targets those using the remote viewing power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mind Crystal Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Crystal Anchor which targets those using telepathy powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Travel Crystal Anchor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Crystal Anchor which targets those using psychoportation powers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Detection
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a crystal mask of detection can make Search checks with a +10 competence bonus.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Discernment
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a crystal mask of discernment can make Sense Motive checks with a +10 insight bonus.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Dread
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a crystal mask of dread can attempt to frighten other beings to her will. The wearer makes all Intimidate checks with a +10 competence bonus.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Insightful Detection
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a crystal mask of insightful detection can make Search checks and Spot checks checks with a +9 insight bonus.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Arcana)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus Knowledge (Arcana) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Architecture and Engineering)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Architecture and Engineering) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Books)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Books) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Dungeoneering)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Dungeoneering) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Geography)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Geography) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (History)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (History) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Local)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Local) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Nature)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Nature) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Nobility and Royalty)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Nobility and Royalty) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Psionics)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Psionics) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (Religion)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (Religion) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Knowledge (The Planes)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Knowledge (The Planes) checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Mindarmor
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A crystal mask of mindarmor grants the wearer a +4 insight bonus on all Will saving throws.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Psionic Craft
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a crystal mask of psionic craft makes all Psicraft checks with a +10 competence bonus.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eyes of Expanded Vision
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Flanking enemies gain a +1 bonus when attacking the user instead of +2 (you are still classed as flanked). The wearer gains a +1 bonus on Spot checks and a –2 penalty on saves against gaze attacks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eyes of Power Leech
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day, the wearer is able to drain power points from another psionic creature or character by meeting its gaze as if using power leech.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Eyes of Power Leech, Vampiric
RPGXplorerObject.HTML: Universal Items\Eyes of Power Leech, Vampiric.htm
RPGXplorerObject.Description: As eyes of power leech, except the wearer gains drained power points from the subject even if doing so would bring him over his normal maximum.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gloves of Object Reading
RPGXplorerObject.Description: While wearing these gloves, the user can learn the details of an inanimate object’s previous owner if he handles the object, as if manifesting the object reading power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Gloves of Titan’s Grip
RPGXplorerObject.Description: While wearing these oversize gloves, the user gains a +8 enhancement bonus on grapple checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mirror of Mind Switch
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A creature meeting its own gaze in the mirror must succeed on a DC 19 Will save, or its mind and the mind of the mirror’s wielder switch, as if by the mind switch power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mirror of Suggestion
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A creature meeting its own gaze in the mirror must succeed on a DC 13 Will save or be affected by a suggestion chosen by the mirror’s wielder.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mirror of Time Hop
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A creature meeting its own gaze in the mirror must succeed on a DC 14 Will save or be pushed forward in time by 5 rounds, as if subject to the time hop power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl, Brain Lock
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This tiny pearly sphere speeds toward its target when hurled by its owner. If the target fails a DC 13 Will saving throw, it stands mentally paralyzed, as if by brain lock, for 3 rounds.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl, Breath Crisis
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This tiny pearly sphere speeds toward its target when hurled by its owner. If the target fails a DC 14 Will saving throw, it is affected as if by crisis of breath for 5 minutes.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl, Mind Seed
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Thrown at a target. If the target fails a DC 22 Will saving throw, it is affected as if by a mind seed power, with the pearl’s wielder acting as the manifester.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Pearl, Personality Parasite
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This tiny pearly sphere speeds toward its target when hurled by its owner. If the target fails a DC 16 Will saving throw, it is affected as if by personality parasite for 5 rounds.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionatrix of clairsentience
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Blue light glimmers in this crystal’s heart.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionatrix of metacreativity
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Green light glimmers in this crystal’s heart.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionatrix of psychokinesis
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Red light glimmers in this crystal’s heart.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionatrix of psychometabolism
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Violet light glimmers in this crystal’s heart.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionatrix of psychoportation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Yellow-red light glimmers in this crystal’s heart.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionatrix of telepathy
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Piercing yellow light shines from this crystal’s heart.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionic Restraints, Lesser
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The cuff limits the number of power points a psionic creature wearing it can use in one round to 5 points (regardless of the creature’s total power point reserve).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionic Restraints, Average
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The cuff limits the number of power points a psionic creature wearing it can use in one round to 3 points (regardless of the creature’s total power point reserve).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionic Restraints, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The cuff limits the number of power points a psionic creature wearing it can use in one round to 1 point (regardless of the creature’s total power point reserve).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Psionic Restraints, Damping
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The cuff completely damps the ability to use psionics.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of the Chameleon
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin adjusts to surrounding textures and colors, continually granting the wearer a +10 enhancement bonus on Hide checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of the Claw
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin benefits only a wearer who has levels in psychic warrior. If such a character wears this skin, he can activate the claws of the beast power at will.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of the Defender
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin continually grants the wearer a +4 bonus to natural armor.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of Fiery Response
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin answers the first attack made against the wearer in each round with an automatically manifested and targeted “ectoburst” against the attacker.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of the Hero
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin continually grants the wearer a +3 deflection bonus to Armor Class, a +3 resistance bonus on all saving throws, and a +3 enhancement bonus on attack rolls.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of Iron
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin affects the wearer as the psionic iron body power up to three times per day for 15 minutes with each use.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of Nimbleness
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin continually grants the wearer a +10 competence bonus on Tumble checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of Proteus
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin continually affects the wearer as the metamorphosis power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of the Psion
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This psychoactive skin grants the wearer 7 bonus power points per day and power resistance 21.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of the Spider
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Grants the wearer a +20 competence bonus on Climb checks, continually affects the wearer as the body equilibrium power. 3/Day the wearer can manifest entangling ectoplasm against a target within 30ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Skin of the Troll
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer heals 5 points of damage per minute. Except for the slower rate of healing, this skin affects its wearer as if the wearer were under the effect of a continual true metabolism power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Ring of Self-Sufficiency
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This crystalline ring continually grants the wearer a +10 competence bonus on Autohypnosis checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +1
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +2
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +3
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +4
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +5
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +6
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +7
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +8
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +9
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shard +10
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A shard grants a temporary competence bonus on one specific skill, ranging from +1 to +10. The granted bonus lasts until the skill is used or 10 rounds pass, whichever comes first.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Aware
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This kind of third eye continually grants the wearer a +10 competence bonus on Spot checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Conceal
RPGXplorerObject.Description: protects the wearer from view by all devices, powers, and spells that detect, inf luence, or read emotions or thoughts.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Concentrate
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This kind of third eye continually grants the wearer a +10 competence bonus on Concentration checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Dominate
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a third eye dominate can attempt to dominate a subject as with the power psionic dominate, augmented to target any creature type it can affect, once per day (save DC 18).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Expose
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of this kind of third eye always knows when someone lies directly to him.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Gather
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This kind of third eye continually grants the wearer a +10 competence bonus on Gather Information checks.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Penetrate
RPGXplorerObject.Description: While worn, a third eye penetrate grants the wearer a +2 bonus on manifester level checks to overcome a creature’s power resistance.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: +2 Manifester Level Check [to overcome a psionic creature’s power resistance]
RPGXplorerObject.Limiter: to overcome a psionic creature’s power resistance

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Powerthieve
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer can borrow a power from a target within 40ft 1/Day. If the target fails a DC 16 Will save, it loses one power of the wearer’s choice, and the wearer gains temporary knowledge of the power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Repudiate
RPGXplorerObject.Description: While worn, this powerful item allows the wearer to manifest dispel psionics once per day with a +20 modifier on the dispel check (the wearer uses the +20 modifier in place of his manifester level).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, Sense
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of this kind of third eye can manifest clairvoyant sense at will.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Third Eye, View
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of this third eye can spin a quasireal version of himself and send it over virtually any distance or into other planes of existence, as if manifesting the remote viewing power, 1/Day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Torc of Free Will
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a torc of free will is not affected by the brain lock power or items that produce brain lock effects (such as crystal anchors).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Torc of Leech Freedom
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a torc of leech freedom automatically resists up to two uses of power leech against him per day.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Torc of Power Preservation
RPGXplorerObject.Description: The wearer of a torc of power preservation manifests all powers by paying power points equal to the standard cost minus 1 (minimum of 1).

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crawling Tattoo of Concussion
RPGXplorerObject.Description: This crawling tattoo delivers a concussion effect, dealing 1d6 points of damage to a creature hit by its touch attack.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crawling Tattoo of Energy Bolt
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Each of these tattoos is keyed to one energy type: cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. This crawling tattoo delivers the energy bolt power, dealing 5d6 points of damage of its energy type.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Crystal Mask of Languages
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A crystal mask of languages grants the wearer the ability to speak and write five different languages.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dust of Disappearance
RPGXplorerObject.Description: A creature or object touched by it becomes invisible (as greater invisibility).
